item.description: Little ones and their families are invited to explore all the seasonal wonders of "Outdoor Winter Fun" while learning American Sign Language at this special story time event. Rediscover your favorite books, tunes and rhymes using sign language. Come sign with us! This story time will be geared for children ages 0 to 4 (all ages are welcome!) and is presented by M&M member Lane Rebelo, founder of Tiny Signs—baby sign language in MetroWest Boston.
item.name: Kids Weekend Activity: Signing Story Time: Outdoor Winter Fun!
